name: XWUI Tooltip Component
description: Hover tooltip component for displaying additional information. Supports various placements, trigger modes (hover, click, focus), delay, offset, and arrow indicator. Useful for help text and additional context.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

placement.description: Placement of the tooltip relative to target

delay.description: Delay in milliseconds before showing tooltip

offset.description: Offset in pixels from target element

arrow.description: Whether to show arrow pointing to target

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the tooltip

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

target.description: Target element to attach tooltip to
